narrative.title: 21 Panzer Division - 1942Q3
narrative.situation: German Panzer-Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q3.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armored spearhead for breakthrough and exploitation operations
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Coastal plain and rocky desert (El Alamein position), firm ground suitable for armor operations

special_rules: Long-range tank gunnery superiority (Panzer IV Special, Panzer III Special)
Desert navigation and operations (2+ years experience)
